message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. As we start our negotiation, I'm willing to offer you the product at a price of $900,000. I think this is a great starting point, considering the value it brings to your business.

Thank you for your offer, Alice.  $900,000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to spend closer to $800,000. I believe this is still a fair price for the value the product brings.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your desire to get a better price, but I'm still confident in the product's value. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product at a price of $850,000. I believe this is a fair compromise, considering the benefits the product will bring to your business.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $850,000, but I'm still hoping for a slightly lower price.  $825,000 feels like a fair compromise for both of us, considering the value of the product.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement here.

Bob, I understand your persistence, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not comfortable going below $850,000. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment and offer the product at a price of $845,000. I believe this is a reasonable compromise, considering the product's value and the benefits it will bring to your business.
